uk.PWIsAlreadyRunning: ParaWorld is already running. Start PWKiller?
uk.LauncherIsAlreadyRunning: This programm is already running. Please close the running version first!
uk.ResetSettings: This will reset your Settings.cfg file, and some saved data (like last IP addresses) will be lost. Do you really want to continue?
uk.ResetSettingsSuccess: Replaced Settings.cfg with Settings_SSSS_backup.cfg. Some options might have been reset to an old state!
uk.OverwriteBackup: Backup file already exists. Overwrite backup file?
uk.BackupCreated: Created Settings_SSSS_backup.cfg from Settings.cfg. This one will be used when settings.cfg becomes corrupt.
uk.SettingsMissing: Settings.cfg not found. If you have never run ParaWorld on this system before, you must run it first to create the necessary files.
uk.SwitchSSSError: Failed to switch server side scripts.
uk.AskSettingsBackup: Do you want to try to use the backup file?
uk.PWKillerTitleText: If ParaWorld crashes or does not terminate, press this button.

us.PWIsAlreadyRunning: ParaWorld is already running. Start PWKiller?
us.LauncherIsAlreadyRunning: This programm is already running. Please close the running version first!
us.ResetSettings: This will reset your Settings.cfg file, and some saved data (like last IP addresses) will be lost. Do you really want to continue?
us.ResetSettingsSuccess: Replaced Settings.cfg with Settings_SSSS_backup.cfg. Some options might have been reset to an old state!
us.OverwriteBackup: Backup file already exists. Overwrite backup file?
us.BackupCreated: Created Settings_SSSS_backup.cfg from Settings.cfg. This one will be used when settings.cfg becomes corrupt.
us.SettingsMissing: Settings.cfg not found. If you have never run ParaWorld on this system before, you must run it first to create the necessary files.
us.SwitchSSSError: Failed to switch server side scripts.
us.AskSettingsBackup: Do you want to try to use the backup file?
us.PWKillerTitleText: If ParaWorld crashes or does not terminate, press this button.

de.CreateSettingsBackupText: Erstellen Sie eine Kopie der Einstellungen
de.PWIsAlreadyRunning: ParaWorld läuft bereits. PW Killer starten?
de.ResetSettings: Dadurch wird die Datei Settings.cfg zurьckgesetzt, und einige gespeicherte Daten (wie die letzten IP-Adressen) gehen verloren. Mцchten Sie wirklich fortfahren?
de.OverwriteBackup: Die Sicherung ist bereits vorhanden. Sicherung überschreiben?
de.BackupCreated: Datei Settings_SSSS_backup.cfg aus Settings.cfg erstellt. Es wird verwendet, um eine beschädigte Settings.cfg wiederherzustellen.
de.SettingsMissing: Settings.cfg nicht gefunden. Sie müssen das Originalspiel ausführen, um die erforderlichen Dateien zu erstellen.
de.SwitchSSSError: Beim Wechseln der Serverskripte ist ein Fehler aufgetreten.
de.AskSettingsBackup: ersuchen Sie, die Einstellungen aus einem Backup wiederherzustellen?
de.PWKillerTitleText: Wenn ParaWorld heruntergefahren ist oder nicht reagiert, klicken Sie auf diese Schaltfläche.

es.CreateSettingsBackupText: Crear una copia de la configuración
es.PWIsAlreadyRunning: Paraworld ya se ha iniciado. ¿Iniciar PWKiller?
es.LauncherIsAlreadyRunning: Este programa ya se ha iniciado.
es.BackupMissing: No se encontró la copia de seguridad de la configuración.
es.ResetSettings: Esto restablecerб su archivo Settings.cfg. Algunos datos guardados (como algunas direcciones IP) se perderбn. ?De verdad quieres continuar?
es.ResetSettingsSuccess: Configuración restaurada desde una copia de seguridad.
es.OverwriteBackup: La copia de seguridad ya existe. ¿Sobrescribir copia de seguridad?
es.BackupCreated: Se creó el archivo Settings_SSSS_backup.cfg desde Settings.cfg. Se utilizará para recuperarse de Settings.cfg dañado.
es.CacheDeleted: El caché de ParaWorld se borró con éxito.
es.SettingsMissing: Settings.cfg no encontrado. Debes ejecutar el juego original para crear los archivos necesarios.
es.SwitchSSSError: Ocurrió un error al cambiar los scripts del servidor.
es.AskSettingsBackup: ¿Intentar restaurar la configuración desde una copia de seguridad?
es.PWKillerTitleText: Si ParaWorld no funciona o no responde, ¡haga clic en este botón.

fr.UpdateTitleText: Une nouvelle mise à jour est sortie !
fr.PWIsAlreadyRunning: Paraworld est dйja en cours. Démarrer PWKiller ?
fr.LauncherIsAlreadyRunning: Ce programme est déjà en cours d'exécution
fr.ResetSettings: Ceci rйinitialisera votre fichier Settings.cfg, et certaines donnйes enregistrйes (comme les dernieres adresses IP) seront perdues. Voulez-vous vraiment continuer?
fr.ResetSettingsSuccess: Paramètres restaurés à partir d'une sauvegarde.
fr.OverwriteBackup: La sauvegarde existe déjà. Écraser la sauvegarde ?
fr.BackupCreated: Création du fichier Settings_SSSS_backup.cfg à partir de Settings.cfg. Il sera utilisé pour récupérer de Settings.cfg corrompu.
fr.CacheDeleted: Le cache ParaWorld a été vidé avec succès.
fr.SettingsMissing: Settings.cfg introuvable. Vous devez exécuter le jeu original pour créer les fichiers nécessaires.
fr.SwitchSSSError: Une erreur s'est produite lors du changement de scripts de serveur.
fr.AskSettingsBackup: Essayez de restaurer les paramètres à partir d'une sauvegarde ?
fr.PWKillerTitleText: Si ParaWorld est en panne ou ne répond pas, cliquez sur ce bouton.

hu.PWIsAlreadyRunning: ParaWorld is already running. Start PWKiller?
hu.LauncherIsAlreadyRunning: This programm is already running. Please close the running version first!
hu.ResetSettings: This will reset your Settings.cfg file, and some saved data (like last IP addresses) will be lost. Do you really want to continue?
hu.ResetSettingsSuccess: Replaced Settings.cfg with Settings_SSSS_backup.cfg. Some options might have been reset to an old state!
hu.OverwriteBackup: Backup file already exists. Overwrite backup file?
hu.BackupCreated: Created Settings_SSSS_backup.cfg from Settings.cfg. This one will be used when settings.cfg becomes corrupt.
hu.SettingsMissing: Settings.cfg not found. If you have never run ParaWorld on this system before, you must run it first to create the necessary files.
hu.SwitchSSSError: Failed to switch server side scripts.
hu.AskSettingsBackup: Do you want to try to use the backup file?
hu.PWKillerTitleText: If ParaWorld crashes or does not terminate, press this button.

it.PWIsAlreadyRunning: ParaWorld è già avviato. Avviare PWKiller?
it.LauncherIsAlreadyRunning: Questo programma è già avviato. Chiudi la versione avviata prima!
it.ResetSettings: Quest'operazione resettera il file Settings.cfg, e alcuni dati salvati (ad esempio ultimi indirizzi IP) saranno persi. Vuoi veramente procedere?
it.ResetSettingsSuccess: Sostituito Settings.cfg con Settings_SSSS_backup.cfg. Alcune impostazioni potrebbero essere state ripristinate ad un vecchio stato!
it.OverwriteBackup: Un file di backup esiste già. Sovrascrivere il file di backup?
it.BackupCreated: Creato Settings_SSSS_backup.cfg da Settings.cfg. Verrà utilizzato in caso settings.cfg sarà corrotto.
it.CacheDeleted: La cache di ParaWorld è stata pulita con successo.
it.SettingsMissing: Settings.cfg non trovato. Se non hai mai avviato ParaWorld su questo PC, devi prima avviarlo per creare i file necessari.
it.SwitchSSSError: Impossibile cambiare gli scripts server side.
it.AskSettingsBackup: Vuoi provare ad usare il file di backup?
it.PWKillerTitleText: Se ParaWorld crasha o non viene terminato, premi questo pulsante.

pl.PWIsAlreadyRunning: Paraworld jest juї uruchomiony. Uruchomić PWKiller?
pl.ResetSettings: Spowoduje to zresetowanie plik Settings.cfg, a niektуre zapisane dane (np ostatnich adresуw IP) zostan№ utracone. Czy na pewno chcesz kontynuowaж?
pl.OverwriteBackup: Kopia zapasowa już istnieje. Zastąpić kopię zapasową?
pl.BackupCreated: Utworzono plik Settings_SSSS_backup.cfg z Settings.cfg. Zostanie on użyty do odzyskania z uszkodzonego pliku Settings.cfg.
pl.CacheDeleted: Pamięć podręczna ParaWorld została pomyślnie wyczyszczona.
pl.SettingsMissing: Nie znaleziono pliku Settings.cfg. Musisz uruchomić oryginalną grę, aby utworzyć niezbędne pliki.
pl.SwitchSSSError: Wystąpił błąd podczas przełączania skryptów serwera.
pl.AskSettingsBackup: Spróbować przywrócić ustawienia z kopii zapasowej?
pl.PWKillerTitleText: Jeśli ParaWorld nie działa lub nie odpowiada, kliknij ten przycisk.

ru.ResetSettings: Это восстановит ваши настройки в Settings.cfg из резервной копии, некоторая информация (например IP адреса) может быть удалена. Вы хотите продолжить?
ru.OverwriteBackup: Резервная копия уже существует. Перезаписать резервную копию?
ru.BackupCreated: Создан файл Settings_SSSS_backup.cfg из Settings.cfg. Он будет использован для восстановления при повреждении Settings.cfg.
ru.SettingsMissing: Settings.cfg не найден. Вы должны запустить оригинальную игру для создания необходимых файлов.
ru.SwitchSSSError: Возникла ошибка при переключении серверных скриптов.
ru.AskSettingsBackup: Попробовать восстановить настройки из резервной копии?
ru.PWKillerTitleText: Если ParaWorld не работает или не отвечает, нажмите эту кнопку.
